trans-unit.source: Please select the visitors category you want to include.
trans-unit.target: Per cortesia seleziona le categorie di visitatori che vuoi aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Please choose the Counter-Template. Counter template files start with mod_visitors_fe_.
Updating the values in the frontend in seconds
Continuous updating of values in the frontend without a new page view. Only when using the template 'mod_visitors_fe_all_ajax'.
No counting for this HTTP_USER_AGENT partial identifier

Here you can specify a partial identifier, it will be no counting. These HTTP_USER_AGENT partial identifier of the browser must be changed.
See Wiki.
